introduce.description: I help the business owner balance the business value & the user needs. Create value for the product by Problem Solving, Critical Thinking, Data Metric, and Interaction Design.

testimonial.author: Long Van
testimonial.message: "Tuan is an excellent UX/UI Designer. His passion for quality and purpose behind his job shines through every interactive design he has made. He is super dedicated and always aims toward higher levels in his career. His learning mindset is amazing. He earned Rising Star and Most Dedicated awards of the company in 2 consecutive years. It would be valuable to have him in a team."

testimonial.author: Danh Nguyen
testimonial.message: "Tuan here to speed up very fast your idea from draft to high-end design. But also input more than expected with Lean Experience for end-users"
